rooms.description: Central living area with large windows for natural light, ensuring Vastu compliance by aligning entrance and main features. Minimalist furniture arrangement to reflect Brutalist style.
Spacious bedroom with direct view of sunrise (east) and north-west alignment for mental clarity. Raw concrete finish in line with Brutalist aesthetic.
Functional kitchen area placed on the south side to ensure good ventilation and compliance with Vastu's directional requirements.
Compact bathroom with efficient plumbing. Placed in west to avoid energy drain according to Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room and kitchen; placed on east side to maximize morning light and positive energy flow.
